problem.markdown:
>>A process equipment in which biological conversion takes place is called as<< ( ) Bioreactor ( ) Fermenter ( ) Bioprocess (x) Bioreactor/ Fermenter
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>Autoclave is used for<< (x) Sterilization ( ) Filtration ( ) Evaporation ( ) Distillation
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>The time for autoclaving depends on<< ( ) Contents Quality (x) Contents Quantity ( ) Quality and Quantity ( ) None of these
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>For controlling solid bed temperature ---- is used as the manipulated variable<< ( ) Tank water flow rate ( ) Acid flow rate (x) Jacket coolant flow rate ( ) Saturated sterile air flow rate
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>------- control scheme is preferred to control bed temperature in fermenter<< (x) PID ( ) On-Off ( ) Manual ( ) MPC
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
